import React from 'react' import Rating from '../Component/Rating'; import data from '../data' export default function ProductScreen(props) { const product = data.products.find((x)=> x.id === props.match.params.id); if(!product._id){ return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Price : ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.decription}

  • Price :
    ${product.price}
  • Status :
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? (In Stock) : (Unavailable)}
) }
